columns.text:
Boasting wonderful interiors, an ultra private balcony and captivating views, this sanctuary of romance is ideal for newlyweds and couples in love. The suite’s highlight is its unique staircase –Kosmas, the owner gifted with an exceptional

talent for carpentry, has created it himself using tree branches! The best is yet to come at the top of the stairs, where guests find themselves in the most fascinating nest-like loft, where the romantic effect is further enhanced by a window overlooking the infinite blue of the sea.

But the X-factor is the newly built Jacuzzi that merges the inside with the outside, as it is part of the bathroom but also opens up onto the private balcony through large windows, allowing for breathtaking views over the terrific volcano and the mesmerising caldera.

Room total: 42 sq.m
Up to 2 Guests/ Sea view

sizes: col-md-12 p-0 three-col px-3 px-sm-0 animation--up

items.description: Treat yourself by enjoying the indoor heated Jacuzzi and your own Private Swimming Pool situated on the exquisite terrace with unique breathtaking views to the Aegean Sea.

items.seo_title: Private Pool Suite | Rooms | Athermi Suites Santorini
items.seo_description: The Private Pool Suite has a luxurious interior, an indoor heated jacuzzi, private pool on an exquisite terrace with unique sea views. Book this suite now!

items.title: Athermi Suite
items.description: The fascinating blend of the volcano’s magnetic energy and the calming effect of the sea transform this charming suite into an inviting destination in its own right.

items.seo_description: The Athermi Suite is nestled in the steep Caldera, has a bathroom with window to superb views. Balcony with sunbeds, outdoor jacuzzi. Book this suite today!

items.title: Romantic Suite
items.description: Boasting a double bedroom, a cosy living room and an exclusive, private balcony, each suite invites you to rediscover your inner self, with a little help from the sweeping views of the Aegean.
